raw_text: BERHARDT – JOHN MAURICE (Ex Staff of Hatton National Bank PLC),​ dearly beloved husband of late June,​ loving father of Horace,​ Steuart,​ Jerome (All of Australia),​ Sherlock and Veron,​ father-in-law of Romaine and Perin (Australia),​ Tracy and Dilika,​ beloved grandfather of Kirk,​ Amanda,​ Dexter,​ Derrick,​ Joshua,​ Jadyne,​ Natalie,​ Sherwyn,​ Trent,​ Bomal and Delvin. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 8 a.m. on Wednesday 6th December. Cortege leaves the Parlour on Thursday 7th December at 3 p.m. for Burial at General Cemetery Borella (Roman Catholic Section). Family contact Number : 0772991183.080238

LABROOY – JUDE – (Lake House) – At rest with Jesus. Dearly beloved husband of Mallika,​ darling father of Dilan,​ loving son of late Duke Labrooy and Maurinne Labrooy,​ brother of Gillian,​ Radley and Sandra,​ bother-in-law of Saman,​ Inoka and Keith,​ expired. Remains lie at his residence: 187/​16C,​ Suraweera Mawatha,​ Walpola from 8 a.m. on 05th December. Cortege leaves residence at 3.00 p.m. for burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.00 p.m. on 06.12.2023. (Australian papers please copy).080542

LORETTA CLARICE WEERASURIYA – expired. Loving wife of (late) Henry Oswald,​ loving daughter of (late) William Lawrence and Gertrude Fernando and daughter-in-law of (late) Harry and Girly Weerasuriya,​ loving mother and mother-in-law of Sharon,​ Hiran and Chamindira (Chammi),​ Lalanthi and Suresh and Priyantha,​ loving grandma of Pramudh and Nethmi,​ Thamith,​ Arnold and Anushika and Kineta,​ great grandmother of Baby Nethara. Remains lie at ‘The Restpect Home’ Jayaratne Funeral Parlour on the 6th and 7th Dec. respectively. Viewing times on the 6th from 3.00 p.m. to 10.00 p.m. and on 7th Dec. from 10.00 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. Thereafter Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the Borella Cemetery.080613

PERERA – NIHAL (N.M.J.T.) (Rtd. Telecom Engineer). Deary beloved husband of Sunil (Singithi Nursery Nugegoda),​ darling father of Dimuthi & Anil,​ Malik & Enakshi,​ Dinali & Ranil,​ loving grandfather of Nimasha,​ Nirusha,​ Anarkalee,​ Nevaan & Kavinda,​ muththa to Liaa,​ Desh & Aanvi. Remains lie at 132/​3,​ Stanley Tillakaratne Mw.,​ Nugegoda till Thursday,​ 7th & thereafter cortege leaves residence at 10.00 a.m. for Cinnamon Gardens Baptist Church followed by Thanksgiving Service at 2.30 p.m. Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatta (Old Crematorium) at 5.00 p.m.080451

PUSSEDENIYA – Y.B. (Former Secretary to the Ministry of Public Administration and Home Affairs,​ Co-operatives and Chief Secretary – Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council). Beloved husband of Upananda,​ loving father of Thusitha,​ Deepthi and Chandana,​ father-in-law of Sriyanath,​ Dinantha and Shermila,​ grandfather of Dinuka,​ Chethaka,​ Sharmal,​ Sahani and Shakya,​ great grandfather of Dinuth,​ expired. Body will be handed over to the Peradeniya Medical Faculty at 2.00 p.m. on 06.12.2023. Will leave home at Aranayaka at 12.00 noon on 06.12.2023. Hakurugammana,​ Aranayaka.080560
